attrs.name: links
attrs.desc: Data configuration item, which can be nested by children.

attrs.name: mask-class
attrs.desc: Class name of the customized scrolling target element

events.name: link-click
events.desc: An anchor click event, which is a callback function triggered after the anchor clicks. //Parameter arg1: click event object //Parameter arg2: {link: click anchor link, title: click node title}

events.name: on-change
events.desc: Listen to the change of the anchor link; Callback function after the anchor point is changed; //arg1: ID of the current anchor
